content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric poles forming electricity network (id=81927)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Science Pack System at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Lab consuming automation and logistic science packs

### Smelting Area
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently idle with coal fuel but no ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites
- Research prerequisites must be completed before researching advanced technologies:
  - Fluid handling requires Engine technology
  - Solar energy requires Optics technology
  - Advanced material processing 2 requires Chemical science pack
  - Electric energy distribution 2 requires Chemical science pack
  - Automation 3 requires Speed module
  - Productivity module requires Modules technology

### Technology Research Status
- Verify if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - Logistics science pack already researched
  - Automation 2 already researched
  - Fast inserter already researched
  - Electric energy distribution 1 already researched
  - Steel processing already researched
  - Advanced material processing already researched

### Technology Name Errors
- Use correct technology names from the Technology enum:
  - "Engine" and "EngineUnit" are invalid technology names

### Resource Management
- Verify sufficient resources before inserting into machines:
  - Check coal availability before attempting to insert into boiler
  - Electronic circuit assembly requires both iron plates and copper cables
